name: Inspectify
headline: Home Inspections, Simplified
description: We founded Inspectify with the goal to make a platform that helps inspectors, real estate professionals and home buyers alike. We see a tremendous opportunity to apply the latest technology to make inspectors more proficient and effective and make home inspections more engaging and value add to home buyers. We are just getting started, but are excited to provide much needed disruption in the space!

founders.name: Josh Jensen, Founder
founders.description: I have been working in tech startups since graduate work, primarily running operations for Series A start-ups. I spend a couple years at Peach, a food delivery start-up and most recently was the VP of Operations at Flyhomes where I oversaw all brokerage operations. I've had a passion for real estate my entire life and have bought 8 homes over the past decade, primarily as investments. I live in Sherman Oaks (Los Angeles) with my wife, Mary, our two girls and our Siberian Husky.

founders.name: Denis Bellavance, Founder
founders.description:
CTO at Inspectify, focused on helping transition eager homebuyers into empowered homeowners through our home ownership platform

Previously also founded a food delivery startup in Seattle called Peach (Still active in Boston/San Diego and Seattle)

Other Past Experience:
Head of Engineering, Loftium
Zillow
Amazon

founders.name: Taylor Zwisler, Founder
founders.description: Experienced Sales Professional with a demonstrated history of working in the Real Estate and tech industries. Skilled in Sales, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Public Speaking, Business Development and Management. Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) focused in Psychology and Law from University of Southern California.

# Better inspections for everyone.
One size doesn't fit all for inspections. We capture the data to help you make confident and informed decisions about your property. 
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cc7a1edefe678405bb5d7_Untitled.png)Buyers & sellers](http://www.inspectify.com/</inspections/buyers-and-sellers>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cc7bb1f827a232a4fc7e8_key%201.png)Single family rentals](http://www.inspectify.com/</inspections/single-family-rental>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cc7d2ff7a65fee976a9db_house\(1\)%201.png)Build to rent](http://www.inspectify.com/</inspections/built-to-rent>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cc7edeb915c2fa6589409_apartment%201.png)Property management](http://www.inspectify.com/</inspections/property-management>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cc80bfbb9ee0217c4e325_houses%201.png)Real estate brokerage](http://www.inspectify.com/</inspections/real-estate-broker>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cc8228a054ebcd93595f1_house%202.png)iBuying & wholesale](http://www.inspectify.com/</inspections/wholesale-and-ibuyers>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cc835b8e839648c4e63c1_save-money%201.png)Real estate lending](http://www.inspectify.com/</inspections/real-estate-lending>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cc84c63e407b14b2f480f_guarantee%201.png)Insurance](http://www.inspectify.com/</inspections/insurance>)
Don't see your industry? [Contact us](http://www.inspectify.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/matt-lao/inspectify-info-call-matt-joe?uuid=d6e7925c-a55b-4f2d-ad4a-e3b6e681cba2>) to learn how we can serve your needs.
WHAT WE DO
## The better way to do property inspections
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cbaae7936865e6557021b_clock.svg)
### Scheduled fast
In today’s market, you need to move quickly. We’ll get your inspection on the books in as little as 24 hours.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cc1f0929d3de0596a571c_administration.svg)
### Managed by us
Make missed calls and lengthy message threads a thing of the past. We’ll handle all of the details.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/666cc204994cf637eb80e634_no-fee.svg)
### No added fees
Our premium service doesn’t come at a premium. You’ll only pay the cost of the inspection.
### Trusted by leading real estate companies around the country
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/6246ea7b0f470a865bf74de3_redfin.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/6246ea7bcf34991b136ea7db_homelight.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/6246ea7b512518ea9af483eb_fundrise.svg)
![Mainstreet Renewal](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/643b3f93777c730cf020c3fb_mainstreet%20renewal.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/643b3fc653620aca17c9fc6a_home%20river%20group.png)

![Steadily](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/643b3f93fbddc12959ef3db1_steadily.svg)

[Get in touch](http://www.inspectify.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/matt-lao/inspectify-info-call-matt-joe?uuid=d6e7925c-a55b-4f2d-ad4a-e3b6e681cba2>)
[Inspection services](http://www.inspectify.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Inspection reporting](http://www.inspectify.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Home rehab](http://www.inspectify.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
## Find the right inspection services
We provide unique inspection services to fit the requirements of anyone who needs data captured on a property—whether you’re a first-time home buyer or a seasoned investment company.
[Learn more](http://www.inspectify.com/</products/inspection-services>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/64181630e2165d1e24587907_Inspection%20Services%201.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/6418163092ce4678a5855a15_Inspection%20Services%202.webp)
## Better inspection reports
Our reporting software enables reliable and consistent data capture that is easy to consume and understand. No matter what the inspection uncovers.
[Learn more](http://www.inspectify.com/</products/inspection-report>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/64181634570b0df45c70d861_Inspection%20Reporting%201.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/6418163592ce4634d9855a69_Inspection%20Reporting%202.webp)
## Build a rehab scope
Use the detailed inspection findings to build a scope for repairs straight from the inspection. Save time and money without sending someone else out to the home.
[Learn more](http://www.inspectify.com/</products/rehab-tool>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/641ba4eb8875d5060333d586_Home%20Rehab.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6a7a5c97390/6246f1ec3d33fa4f4918b0f4_map.svg)
NATIONWIDE COVERAGE
## We’ve got you covered from coast-to-coast
[Book an inspection](http://www.inspectify.com/<https:/app2.inspectify.com/teams/ux5hJChkF8BWGmnzPSQL81ap/orders/new>)
FOR INSPECTORS
## Become an inspector on Inspectify and grow your business

"Your service has really helped take a lot of the legwork out of marketing, allowing me to focus more on inspections."
![David in Texas](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6242bf39bce3e6c89cc973b7/6242bf39bce3e689e0c97497_unnamed%20\(1\).jpeg)
David in Texas
"Using Inspectify we have been booked and busy. We would not want it any other way."

"Inspectify has been outstanding to work with."

generated_description:
### Inspectify: Simplifying Home Inspections

**Company Overview**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's S20 batch, Inspectify is revolutionizing the home inspection business. Based in Seattle, WA, the company is on a mission to simplify the complex world of home inspections. With a team of 55 passionate employees, Inspectify is not just a service; it's a comprehensive platform designed for home inspectors, real estate professionals, and home buyers. Their goal? To make inspections more engaging and valuable, leveraging the latest technology to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.

**Core Mission**

Inspectify's tagline "Home Inspections, Simplified" encapsulates their commitment to clarity and accessibility in property assessments. They are keenly aware of the challenges faced in real estate transactions and aim to streamline the inspection process, making it faster and more straightforward for everyone involved.

**Services Offered**

Inspectify provides a suite of services tailored to various needs in the real estate landscape, including:
- **Inspection Services:** Detailed assessments for home buyers, sellers, and property managers.
- **Inspection Reporting:** Reliable and easy-to-understand data capture that highlights crucial findings.
- **Rehab Tools:** Practical resources to help buyers plan for repairs based on inspection outcomes.
- **Warranty Options:** Additional peace of mind for home buyers.

Their platform offers flexible, customizable solutions that fit the unique requirements of users—whether they are first-time buyers or seasoned investors.

**Unique Selling Proposition**

What sets Inspectify apart is its commitment to fast, managed, and cost-effective inspections:
- **Rapid Scheduling:** Inspections can be booked in as little as 24 hours.
- **Managed Services:** They handle all the details, negating the hassle of missed calls or lost messages.
- **Transparent Pricing:** Users only pay the necessary cost of the inspection—no hidden fees.

This model not only enhances user experience but also fosters trust among clients and partners.

**Market Position and Vision**

The company operates within the 'proptech' marketplace, targeting a critical area in the real estate sector with significant growth potential. With support from investors like Brad Flora, Inspectify is poised for continued disruption in the industry, targeting an increase in the number of inspections across the U.S. Their partnerships with leading real estate firms signal a strong reputation and a reliable service model.

**Conclusion**

In a nutshell, Inspectify is more than just an inspection service—it's a movement towards innovation in real estate processes. As they continue to grow and evolve, their practical approach aims to provide better inspections for everyone involved in the property market.

For more information, you can visit [Inspectify's website](http://www.inspectify.com).
